title: Handle a Vessel Agent Query about Port Charges
description: A vessel agent calls to get an estimate of port charges for an upcoming vessel call.

tasks.description: Obtain the vessel's details (GT, LOA) and planned activities (number of container moves) from the agent.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator gathers all necessary information for the estimate.

tasks.description: Use the port tariff document to look up the rates for wharfage, pilotage, and stevedoring.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator finds the correct rates based on the vessel's size and cargo volume.

tasks.description: Calculate the estimated total cost and provide it to the agent, stating that it is a non-binding estimate.
tasks.expected_outcome: A pro-forma invoice is generated and communicated to the agent with a disclaimer.
